Name: t_aisatu
Text:
(This girl's name is {0}.
{0} doesn't speak. No one has ever heard her voice.
However {0} is quite eloquent, using expression and gestures to speak.)

Name: t_suspect
Text: (Kukrushka's expression shows contempt toward {0}.)

Name: t_suspect
Text:
(She's tired of hearing {0} speak.
This much is clear.)

Name: t_suspect
Text:
(Can {0} be trusted? Really...?
You can feel her questioning everyone.)

Name: t_suspect
Text:
({0} is too quiet, and can't be trusted,
say her expression and gestures.)

Name: t_suspect
Text:
(Kukrushka thinks for a moment and points to {0}.
Her calculations indicate that {0} is suspicious.)

Name: t_suspect
Text:
({0} cannot be trusted,
says Kukrushka with her eyes.)

Name: t_suspect
Text:
(I can't cooperate with {0} any longer,
says Kukrushka's sorrowful gaze.)

Name: t_suspect
Text:
({0} attacked {1}? Why?
Kukrushka stares with contempt.)

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
(I should never have trusted {0},
sighs Kukrushka.)

Name: t_suspect_r
Text: (Noticing that {0} has been overly talkative, Kukrushka scowls in dismay.)

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
(We can no longer trust {0}.
No, it's too dangerous...
Kukrushka emotes to the group.)

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
({0}, you should speak up more,
Kukrushka seems to be saying.)

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
(Kukrushka looks at {0}, and delves into thought.
Stochastically speaking, {0} is suspicious.
Apparently she no longer trusts them.)

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
(It seems {0} can't be trusted after all,
Kukrushka seems to be saying.)

Name: t_suspect_add
Text:
(I feel {0} may be suspicious...
Kukrushka's body language says as much.)

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
(Kukrushka also turned against {0}.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
({0}, just stop,
says Kukrushka with a gaze.)

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: (Kukrushka looks upon {0} with sorrow...)

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
(Kukrushka stares at {0},
as if to warn the group of danger.)

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
(Yes, {0} is definitely suspicious,

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: (Kukrushka's eyes are filled with suspicion toward {0}.)

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text: (Kukrushka stares at {0} sternly...)

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
({0}, I'm sorry, but...
Kukrushka appears to have given up.)

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
({1} is right,
Kukrushka nods.)

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
(No way... {0}...?

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
(Kukrushka seems taken aback.
She seems to have forgotten all about {0}.)

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
(We have no choice but to suspect {0},

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: (Apparently Kukrushka has yet to fully trust {0}.)

Name: t_suspected0
Text:
(Kukrushka, under suspicion,
stands quietly, watching things play out...)

Name: t_suspected0
Text:
(Feeling she has lost the favor of the group,

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
(It's OK. I trust you, {0},
Kukrushka smiles, attempting to lift her friend's spirits.)

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
(No. Don't listen to {1}...
Kukrushka's expression turns severe.)

Name: t_hanron1
Text:
(I trust you, {0},
emotes Kukrushka with a smile.)

Name: t_hanron_t0
Text:
(Smiling brightly,
Kukrushka clearly trusts {0}.)

Name: t_hanron_t1
Text:
(I don't doubt {0} at all,

Name: t_trust
Text:
(Kukrushka smiles at {0}.
Her unwavering trust is clear.)

Name: t_trust
Text:
(By my calculations, {0} can be trusted,

Name: t_trust
Text:
(We can trust {0}...
Kukrushka seems to want everyone else to trust {0}, too.)

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
(Kukrushka once again expresses her faith in {0}.

Name: t_trust_r
Text:

Text:

Her eyes show no sign of trust.)

Name: t_thanron_t1
Text:

Let's wait and see what happens, Kukrushka seems to say.)

Name: t_hosho
Text:
It's pretty obvious that {0} is definitely {1}.
Any objections?

Name: t_hosho
Text: {0} is human. I think we can agree on this.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} is lying.
There's no way you're {1}.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text: {0} is... {1}. They have to be.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text: Something about {0} is wrong.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
{0} is not Gnosia. This is a fact.
But {0} is lying. This is also a fact.

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text:
({0} is mistaken,
Kukrushka seems to say, shaking her head.)

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text:

Name: t_hosho_get
Text:
(Kukrushka seems happy to have been recognized as {1}.
Her joy is palpable.)

Name: t_hosho_get
Text:
(Seemingly realizing that she's been pushed into a corner,
Kukrushka stares at {0}, frustratedly.)

Name: t_tohyo_go
Text:
(So, nobody has anything to say...?
Kukrushka looks away, silently.
It's about time to vote.)

Name: t_tohyo_mae
Text:
(Kukrushka's expression turns serious.
The time to vote has come...)

Name: t_tohyo_sai
Text: (Kukrushka is surprised that a vote must be taken again.)

Name: t_shokei
Text: (Kukrushka is going off to sleep...)

Name: t_shokei
Text:
(Kukrushka will be sent off to cold sleep.
She looks down at the floor in shame.)

Name: t_wakare
Text: (You can feel the sadness in Kukrushka's heart...)

Name: t_karare
Text:
(Kukrushka, under attack by {0},
smiles faintly, but frighteningly...)

Name: t_imjinro
Text: (Kukrushka was {0}...)

Name: t_shori
Text: (Kukrushka quietly enjoys the victory.)

Name: t_tohyo_kurikaeshi
Text:
(A tie, yet again.
Exhaustion is beginning to show on Kukrushka's face.)

Name: t_tohyo_jeno
Text:
(Let's send all of those selected off to cold sleep,
Kukrushka seems to be saying.)

Name: t_tohyo_alive
Text: (Kukrushka expresses her desire to give this up and rest for the day.)

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ok
Text:
(We have no choice but to send everyone to cold sleep...

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ng
Text:
(Kukrushka shakes her head.
She seems to be against this.)

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ok
Text:
(Kukrushka nods her head.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ng
Text:
(Kukrushka's expression looks dire.
Apparently she is against the idea.)

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_kettei
Text:
(Kukrushka's idea was accepted,
and all those selected will be sent off to cold sleep.)

Name: t_tohyo_alive_kettei
Text:
(Kukrushka's idea was accepted,
and this time, nobody will go into cold sleep.)

Name: t_tohyo_hitei
Text: (Kukrushka signs in disappointment at her idea being rejected.)

Name: t_tohyo_dame
Text:
(Kukrushka seems ready to fall asleep at any moment.
She's about at her limit for the day...)

Text: (Kukrushka nods.

(Kukrushka nods.

Text:
(It's not good to test people like that...
Kukrushka doesn't like this.)

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
(Somehow, you can picture the food Kukrushka is imagining.
It's... borscht, definitely borscht.)

Text:
(You can feel love in Kukrushka's eyes.
However, you can't tell toward whom it is felt...)

(Kukrushka seems frightened.
She seems to dislike scary stories.)

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
(Is this really the time for this kind of talk...?

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
(I guess we have no choice...

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
(I don't want to have to do that...

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
(Kukrushka seems to be against it.
It's clear by the look in her eyes.)

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
(But, nobody reported such a thing...
Kukrushka shakes her head.)

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
(Kukrushka nods her head...
She, too, agrees with the vote against {0}.)

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
(Kukrushka says nothing.
She simply stares at {1}...)

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
(Kukrushka can't accept this...
She stares at {1}, expressing her disagreement.)

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
(Kukrushka smiles, trying to make {0} feel better.
She's showing that she's against the vote for {0}.)

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
(Kukrushka nods, implying that she understands...
She is not going to vote against {0}.)

Text:
(We should be able to choose for ourselves...
Kukrushka is against this.)

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
(Kukrushka nods with a severe expression on her face...
She, too, seems to be against {1}'s proposal.)

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
(Help me, {0}...
Kukrushka's gaze says as much.)

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
(Let's get through this together...
Kukrushka smiles like a blossoming flower.)

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
(Kukrushka shakes her head as if to say...
I'm sorry, {0}, but I can't help you...)

Text:
({1} scares me...
Kukrushka's body language says as much, as she shivers.)

Name: t_skill_t_kyakushoku
Text:
({1} helped me, so...

Name: t_skill_t_kyakushoku
Text:
(Kukrushka seems to agree with {2}...
She seems very trusting.)

Name: t_skill_t_kyakushoku
Text:
(It's not {1} who's dangerous...
Kukrushka seems to be warning the group with her expression.)

Name: t_skill_h_dojo
Text:
(Kukrushka seems overcome with sadness...
She seems as if she's about to disappear.)

({0}, I know you'll help me...

Name: t_skill_h_help

(Kukrushka shakes her head.
She seems to have no intention of helping.)

Name: t_skill_dogeza
Text: (Kukrushka seems confused...)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka...
seems to be staring off into space...)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Hm...? Maybe she hasn't noticed...?
Kukrushka doesn't even look at you.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(I can't forgive {0}...
Kukrushka's animosity is apparent in her expression.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(We can trust each other, {0}...
Kukrushka looks very happy.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka smiles.
She seems to like you.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka looks toward you and bows.
Apparently she had been waiting for you to come see her.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
({0}, I want to hear you talk...
Kukrushka touches your shoulder in a familiar manner.)

Name: t_personal
Text: (Kukrushka greets you with a smile.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka seems to be...
wary of you.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka seems completely unfazed...
She's simply smiling.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka holds your hand to greet you.
You can feel a deep trust in her touch.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka is spinning her head around quickly with a smile.
You have no idea what she's trying to say...)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Hm...? Maybe she hasn't noticed...?
Kukrushka doesn't even look at you.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka looks at you quietly.
You can feel her fondness for you in her eyes.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka's expression darkens.
Apparently you aren't very welcome here...)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka's gaze...
It's filled with contempt, and a sort of sadness.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka smiles,
as if to invite everyone to talk together.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Listen, {0}...
Kukrushka seems to say.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
({1} is lying.
Kukrushka tells you this.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(So {0}, I need your help.
Let's put {1} into cold sleep.
Kukrushka is counting on you.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Good...
Kukrushka seems to feel more at ease.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Thank you, {0}.
You can feel Kukrushka's appreciation.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka looks toward you...
She seems to want to say something.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(I feel I can trust you, {0}...
Kukrushka seems to want to form an alliance.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka smiles like a blossoming flower.
You can feel her happiness...)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Let's dance together, OK?
You'll likely be dancing with Kukrushka till late.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(How unfortunate...
Kukrushka shakes her head, sadly.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(But, I trust you...
Kukrushka smiles as you part ways.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka seems to...
be worried about something...)

Name: t_personal
Text:
({1} is dangerous...
I want you to eliminate {1} tonight.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Please, {0}...
Kukrushka begs you.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka seems to be happy to have {1} out of the way.
You can feel her joy.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka glances at you.
She smiles, ever so slightly.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(We won! We won!
Kukrushka's entire body expresses her joy.)

Name: t_personal
t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka smiles quietly.
She's happy to have won.)

Name: t_personal
Text: (Kukrushka seems somehow restless.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(I'm sorry for not trusting you, {0}.
Please forgive me...?
You can feel the sadness in her apology.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Let's spend lots more time together, OK?
Kukrushka's smile seems somehow more childlike than usual.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(But, what do we do now...?
Kukrushka, suddenly having lost purpose,
seems to be somewhat confused.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(We're done playing with the Gnosia.
We have to find something else to have fun with.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(The Gnosia side has won.
Kukrushka is smiling happily.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Yay, {0}!
Kukrushka's body language shows how happy she is.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(It's all thanks to you, {0}. Thank you...
You can feel Kukrushka's appreciation.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(That was fun, {0}.
Let's dance together again...
Kukrushka smiles.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(It's over now.
Kukrushka laughs...)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(What is it about Kukrushka...?
This strange, evil smile...)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Wow, that feels good!
Kukrushka smiles brightly.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Now, everything will be gone.
Every single thing.
Doesn't it feel refreshing?)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Kukrushka implies this,
looking extremely happy.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
({0}, you like Gnosia, do you?
Kukrushka asks with her eyes.)

Name: t_personal
Text:
(In that case, I'll get rid of you personally.
As thanks for trying so hard.
Kukrushka smiles happily.)

Name: t_personal
Text: (Bye-bye, {0}.)

Name: t_temp
Text:
High Charm and Performance abilities make her
hard to target for cold sleep, even when doubted.
Acting mainly on emotion, she targets those she
dislikes over dangerous enemies.
